item.title: REQUESTS NEEDED --- If you have any pictures you think would look good in the backgrounds or have an idea for menus on the next update - Let me know!
KRYPTON USERS ---- All builds updated Dec 8th ---- A patch will be applied once MK-IV Wizard updates to fix errors
The first time you use an item after updating MK-IV will take a little longer, this is normal as it is cacheing files and generating thumbnails. Please be patient.
New servers are up --- MK-IV Repos are @ http://get.mkiv.ca -and- https://mk-iv.github.io

XXX Adult content is still available, to access it open MK-IV Wizard's settings (can be done through the the wizard by clicking backup/restore then start here) and enabling Adult Content. A new menu item will appear in the menu. XXX
Thanks for all the support!!! If you have any questions or comments feel free to contact me on the Ares forum - https://ares-project.uk/ - @CamC
Click on MK-IV for Christmas movies and fireplaces.
